name: Operation: REDWIND
description:
Developed for BRACKEYS JAM 2020.2 over the course of a week, Operation: REDWIND represents the combined efforts of two passionate, sleep deprived first time developers. 

Step into the combat boots of a frontline communications officer trying to make the best of a bad situation by redirecting high-command's scattered, sometimes contradicting orders.

And when you just can't make sense of high-command's demands, why not simply rewind the tape and find new purpose for past commands? You're still following your orders, you're just... re-interpreting them, right?

But be careful, each rewind will damage your tape, leaving you short of one command on play-back.

So, take control over a battlegroup of infantry, artillery and armoured units and liberate a village from the clutches of your oponent in three, different scenarios!

__________________________________________________________________________

Game Design & Programming by DeagleDryan

Art by Orkfaeller

__________________________________________________________________________

Known Bugs & Issues:

- You might experience a short lag when hitting 'start'. Don't worry, it just takes a couple seconds.

- The enemy is known to make an illegal move very occasionally 

- Sometimes attack or move commands on neighbouring tiles don't register
